markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Scavenger](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=458)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 51 <sup>1.1</sup>

 

</column>

You've made a living sorting through the things society throws away. You might have scavenged simply to survive, or plied a trade as a ragpicker, dung carter, or the like. While you've left that life behind, you still keep one eye on the ground out of habit.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill, and a [Lore](/skills/lore) skill for the settlement you grew up scavenging in. You gain the [Forager](/Feats.aspx?ID=5152) skill feat.
name: Scavenger

summary_markdown: You've made a living sorting through the things society throws away. You might have scavenged simply to survive, or plied a trade as a ragpicker, …
text: Scavenger Source Player Core 2 pg. 51 1.1 You've made a living sorting through the things society throws away. You might have scavenged simply to survive, or plied a trade as a ragpicker, dung carter, or the like. While you've left that life behind, you still keep one eye on the ground out of habit. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Survival skill, and a Lore skill for the settlement you grew up scavenging in. You gain the Forager skill feat.
